channel.title: NPCDrops error

item.title: NPCDrops error
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

Yes I know that it probably means I spaced instead of tabbed but I can’t seem to find where… This is the error.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 0//Small Pouch" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2043) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:110)

this is my npcdrops anybody fix then post it please? [code]//Edited on November 9th 2009
//By Keegan, Made more well written and easier to read
//With drops for more NPC’s
